name: 巴伦西亚传说：索菲亚的重生 Valencia Saga:Sophia's rebirth
detailed_description:
The game was created independently by the author for three years, initially as a peer game, and was eventually replaced with most of the resources for a variety of reasons and decided to be released in two versions, Rebirth and Recovery (free)
The recovery version will be confirmed after release of the rebirth version.
A rare object will be presented as a thank you game for rebirth.

The game will be possible to screen the whole screen in different environments. If you encounter this problem, use the window mode.
The game still has a small problem on the screen, but it doesn't affect the play.

The game is difficult and may take you a lot of time. It offers simple difficulty but it doesn't satisfy everyone.
If you want to experience easily, please choose carefully.

E-mail：751510917@qq.com

short_description: 故事从一个大陆中的两个国家战争开始，围绕两位主角为了拯救大陆的百姓而展开的冒险

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: win7\win10
  • Processor: Pentium Dual Core及以上
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce FX5600级/ATI Radeon9600以上 (支持Shader 2.0以上的显卡)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 可互换声卡
  • Additional Notes: XP不能运行
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: win7\win10
  • Processor: I3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce FX5600
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 可互换声卡
  • Additional Notes: XP不能运行
